description: This file defines the main frontend component for a React-based task management application. It manages creating, updating, deleting, and filtering tasks via a series of state variables and functions, and renders the UI including task list, filters, and input forms.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch tasks from the backend API on component load.

methods.name: onAddTask
methods.description: Creates a new task with optimistic UI update and handles possible errors.

methods.name: onToggle
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a task with optimistic update.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Initializes editing state for a specific task.

methods.name: saveEdit
methods.description: Saves changes to a task with optimistic update and error handling.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a task with optimistic UI update and handles errors.
